name: dissection
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical, biology
  specialized the action of cutting something open, especially a dead body or plant, in order to study its structure: Traditional surgical approaches to spinal pain involve open dissection of soft tissue and bone.

Medical treatment: surgery
the process of examining or considering something in detail, or a piece of work that is the result of doing this: The novel is really a dissection of nationalism.
